TopicTitle: Ship takes off when running near landed ship

Articles.Content:
Landed about 5km from Mun Arch.  Had to walk it.  Saved and closed after that.

Reloaded game later and ran back to the ship (5km...) upon reaching the vicinity of the ship, the ship suddenly leaped into the air.  Reproduced multiple times.  If the Kerbal is running towards the ship when it enters ship vicinity, ship leaps into the air and then often crashes.  If I walk into the vicinity of the ship, then it doesn't do this.
KSP 2 version is the original early access.

My machine is a Predator Helios 300 Laptop with GE Force GTX 1060
